settings.name: Gulshan Kundnani
settings.title: Software Developer
settings.summary:
> Software developer with 5+ years of professional experience in the .NET Framework and C#.
> Proven track record in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable, high-performance web applications.
> Adept at working both independently and collaboratively within Agile teams to deliver quality solutions on time.
> Strong problem-solving skills with a commitment to clean, maintainable code and continuous learning of emerging technologies.
> Ability to communicate technical progress and challenges clearly to clients and offer support throughout project phases.

items.description:
> Worked closely with cross-functional Agile teams to deliver features on time while managing client expectations effectively.
> Integrated third-party APIs such as RealBooks API, Facebook API, Odoo API, etc ensuring data exchange and enhancing system functionality.
> Developed import utilities for various modules to ensure bulk data migration.
> Analyzed and Optimized code to improve system performance and low latency.
> Learned and applied software development best practices and Agile methodologies.
> Collaborated directly with clients to gather requirements, clarify project scope, and provide regular status updates, ensuring alignment between technical teams.

items.title: Telegram Bot
items.description:
> Automatically detect and remove spam, offensive language, or unwanted content.
> Warn, mute, or ban users breaking group rules without requiring manual admin intervention.
> Welcome new members with custom messages.
> Share reminders, scheduled announcements, or important updates.

items.title: PDF ChatBot
items.description:
> Instant Document Search & Retrieval.
> Reduces support staff workload by automating answers sourced directly from PDF content.
> Enables interactive learning and quick access to relevant information.
> Saves time by providing concise information without reading the whole document.
